subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: At the suggestion of Dave Magadan, Boston’s batting coach, David Ortiz has reduced the clutter in his mind and focused on enjoying the game. His rebound as a hitter suggests it’s working.
snippet: At the suggestion of Dave Magadan, Boston’s batting coach, David Ortiz has reduced the clutter in his mind and focused on enjoying the game. His rebound as a hitter suggests it’s working.
